data.title: What is the image of the painting in the movie love affair 1994?
data.meta_description: Answers is the place to go to get the answers you need and to ask the questions you want
data.text:
What was Jim carrys first movie?

Jim Carey's first movie was called All In Good Taste. The film was released in 1983, and he did not have his starring role as Ace Ventura until 1994.

Who is jefford curre?

Jefford Curre' is better known as the Bahamas leading man of action. In 1994 he invented the Bahamas Film Industry with the establishment of the Paradise Island based ''Megavision Pictures Limited''. He is also the star of the Bahamas first movie ''Paradise Intrigue''

What was the top song on Jan 20th 1994?

Here is a list of the top 100 songs of 1994: http://www.musicoutfitters.com/topsongs/1994.htm

How many times has the painting The Scream been stolen?

There were four versions of The Scream - One of the four were stolen from Oslo's National Gallery in 1994 and one from the Munch Museum in Oslo in 2004.
